skills.name: Prometheus
skills.description: Within the next 10.0s after unleashing Ultimate and Burst mode, each hit unleashed by the wielder additionally deals 60.0% ATK of Fire DMG; however, this DMG bonus can only be triggered once per second against each target.

skills.name: Herakles
skills.description: Ultimate and Burst ATKs deal 35.0% more Total DMG.
